resources.string: Keep your mobile security info save and retrievable, anytime, anywhere.
Saves your mobile security info(password,pattern or pin) to your email for easy retrieval.
The easiest way to keep in touch with your Friends!
Sticker is best way then long text!

SaveLock is an Info-Security System that was built to help you create authentic backup and retrieval medium of your security info such as pattern, password or pin using your email(s). This simply means upon any means where you are unable to remember your security info, you can retrieve it right from the email(s) used when setting up your SaveLock configuration. SaveLock also has a customized fingerprint functionality that enables you to lock/unlock your phone with your fingerprint, even when your phone has no fingerprint authentication
